content: hello here s my 4th little monster blinkie the pattern is written in u s terminology this project is worked in rounds so you might want to use a stitch marker to mark the beginning of each round make sure to read the whole pattern before you start this monster is approx 14cm 5 5 in if you use the same yarn and tools indicated in the pattern materials yarn white and other color of your choice - color b for this pattern i used have fun from matti yarns 50g / 100m 2004 ochre and 1001 white 2 5 mm crochet hook 7 mm black safety eye polyester fiberfill stuffing yarn needle scissors this pattern is for personal use only
